Entry.JapaneseText: 本当に盗賊が出るのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think any bandits are going to show up?

Entry.JapaneseText: わからん。確かにこの辺りは盗賊が多い。 昔、盗賊団を討伐に来た事がある。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know. I know that there are many thieves in this area. A long time ago, I came here to put down a band of them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、正規軍の援軍としてな。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, we were there as reinforcements for the regular army.

Entry.JapaneseText: とは言え、有象無象の連中だ。 団結力も統率力も、軍の足元にも及ばなかった。
Entry.EnglishText: However, those bandits were a ragtag group. They were no match for the leadership and cohesion of the military.

Entry.JapaneseText: つまり、俺たちが恐れるような 相手ではないという事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: So we have no reason to fear them.
